description:
Netflix has officially announced their decision to cancel a fan-favorite series on their platform. Sadly, the series was originally saved by Netflix for its third season, so it’s definitely disappointing for fans to see it canceled for good. Now fans will have to accept the show’s conclusion after a mere three seasons, with two having [...]

title: Netflix Cancels Fan-Favorite Series After 3 Seasons

description:

description:
The DC Universe is finally getting off the ground. Now that the DCU animated series Creature Commandos is airing on Max, fans are prepared to see the first live-action feature in the highly-anticipated cinematic universe. Now, as you can see below, the first trailer for James Gunn’s Superman has been released online. The new DCU [...]

title: First Trailer For James Gunn’s ‘Superman’ Released
